Question
========
Someone is saving up to buy a new television and definitely wants to not pay more than €900. This person takes a random sample of 100 televisions and calculates the average price in this sample. This sample mean is €810, and the standard deviation (SD) is € 130. Assume a normal distribution.  
  
What percentage of televisions in the sample cost less than € 900? Round Round up to a whole percentage.

Answerlist
----------
* 69%
* 31%
* 25%
* 75%

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* False
* False
* False
* True
